verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* a \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* were passed \w away|strong="G3928"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there \w was|strong="G2076"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w* \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* the \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, coming \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w prepared|strong="G2090"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w bride|strong="G3565"\w* \w adorned|strong="G2885"\w* for \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w tabernacle|strong="G4633"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \add is\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he will \w dwell|strong="G4637"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \add and be\add* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* shall wipe \w away|strong="G1813"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w tears|strong="G1144"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w sorrow|strong="G3997"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w crying|strong="G2906"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* shall there \w be|strong="G2071"\w* any \w more|strong="G2089"\w* \w pain|strong="G4192"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* the former \w things|strong="G4413"\w* are passed \w away|strong="G0565"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, I \w make|strong="G4160"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w new|strong="G2537"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w Write|strong="G1125"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w true|strong="G0228"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, It is \w done|strong="G1096"\w*. \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w Alpha|strong="G0001"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Omega|strong="G5598"\w*, the \w beginning|strong="G0746"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w end|strong="G5056"\w*. \w I|strong="G1473"\w* will \w give|strong="G1325"\w* unto him that is \w athirst|strong="G1372"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w fountain|strong="G4077"\w* of the \w water|strong="G5204"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w freely|strong="G1432"\w*.

\w He|strong="G3588"\w* that \w overcometh|strong="G3528"\w* shall \w inherit|strong="G2816"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I will \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w my|strong="G3427"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w fearful|strong="G1169"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w unbelieving|strong="G0571"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w abominable|strong="G0948"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w murderers|strong="G5406"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w whoremongers|strong="G4205"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sorcerers|strong="G5332"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w idolaters|strong="G1496"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w liars|strong="G5571"\w*, shall have \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w part|strong="G3313"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w lake|strong="G3041"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w burneth|strong="G2545"\w* with \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brimstone|strong="G2303"\w*: \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* which \w had|strong="G2192"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w vials|strong="G5357"\w* \w full|strong="G1073"\w* of the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w last|strong="G2078"\w* \w plagues|strong="G4127"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w talked|strong="G2980"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Come \w hither|strong="G1204"\w*, I will \w shew|strong="G1166"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* the \w bride|strong="G3565"\w*, the \w Lamb’s|strong="G0721"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w carried|strong="G0667"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w away|strong="G0667"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w high|strong="G5308"\w* \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w shewed|strong="G1166"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* that \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, the \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w descending|strong="G2597"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*,

\w Having|strong="G2192"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w light|strong="G5458"\w* \add was\add* like \w unto|strong="G3664"\w* a \w stone|strong="G3037"\w* most \w precious|strong="G5093"\w*, even \w like|strong="G5613"\w* a \w jasper|strong="G2393"\w* \w stone|strong="G3037"\w*, clear as \w crystal|strong="G2929"\w*;

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* a \w wall|strong="G5038"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w high|strong="G5308"\w*, \add and\add* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w gates|strong="G4440"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* the \w gates|strong="G4440"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w names|strong="G3686"\w* written \w thereon|strong="G1924"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \add the names\add* of the \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w tribes|strong="G5443"\w* of the \w children|strong="G5207"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*:

\w On|strong="G0575"\w* the \w east|strong="G0395"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w gates|strong="G4440"\w*; \w on|strong="G0575"\w* the \w north|strong="G1005"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w gates|strong="G4440"\w*; \w on|strong="G0575"\w* the \w south|strong="G3558"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w gates|strong="G4440"\w*; and \w on|strong="G0575"\w* the \w west|strong="G1424"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w gates|strong="G4440"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w wall|strong="G5038"\w* of the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w foundations|strong="G2310"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* the \w names|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* of the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* that \w talked|strong="G2980"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* a \w golden|strong="G5552"\w* \w reed|strong="G2563"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w measure|strong="G3354"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w gates|strong="G4440"\w* \w thereof|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w wall|strong="G5038"\w* \w thereof|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w lieth|strong="G2749"\w* \w foursquare|strong="G5068"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w length|strong="G3372"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* as \w large|strong="G5118"\w* \w as|strong="G3745"\w* the \w breadth|strong="G4114"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w measured|strong="G3354"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* with the \w reed|strong="G2563"\w*, \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5505"\w* \w furlongs|strong="G4712"\w*. The \w length|strong="G3372"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w breadth|strong="G4114"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w height|strong="G5311"\w* of \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \w equal|strong="G2470"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w measured|strong="G3354"\w* the \w wall|strong="G5038"\w* \w thereof|strong="G0846"\w*, an \w hundred|strong="G1540"\w* \add and\add* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \add and\add* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w cubits|strong="G4083"\w*, \add according to\add* the \w measure|strong="G3358"\w* of a \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, of the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w building|strong="G1739"\w* of the \w wall|strong="G5038"\w* of \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \add of\add* \w jasper|strong="G2393"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \add was\add* \w pure|strong="G2513"\w* \w gold|strong="G5553"\w*, like \w unto|strong="G3664"\w* \w clear|strong="G2513"\w* \w glass|strong="G5194"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w foundations|strong="G2310"\w* of the \w wall|strong="G5038"\w* of the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \add were\add* \w garnished|strong="G2885"\w* with all \w manner|strong="G3956"\w* of \w precious|strong="G5093"\w* \w stones|strong="G3037"\w*. The \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w foundation|strong="G2310"\w* \add was\add* \w jasper|strong="G2393"\w*; the \w second|strong="G1208"\w*, \w sapphire|strong="G4552"\w*; the \w third|strong="G5154"\w*, a \w chalcedony|strong="G5472"\w*; the \w fourth|strong="G5067"\w*, an \w emerald|strong="G4665"\w*;

The \w fifth|strong="G3991"\w*, \w sardonyx|strong="G4557"\w*; the \w sixth|strong="G1623"\w*, \w sardius|strong="G4556"\w*; the \w seventh|strong="G1442"\w*, \w chrysolite|strong="G5555"\w*; the \w eighth|strong="G3590"\w*, \w beryl|strong="G0969"\w*; the \w ninth|strong="G1766"\w*, a \w topaz|strong="G5116"\w*; the \w tenth|strong="G1182"\w*, a \w chrysoprasus|strong="G5556"\w*; the \w eleventh|strong="G1734"\w*, a \w jacinth|strong="G5192"\w*; the \w twelfth|strong="G1428"\w*, an \w amethyst|strong="G0271"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w gates|strong="G4440"\w* \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w pearls|strong="G3135"\w*; \w every|strong="G1538"\w* \w several|strong="G0303"\w* \w gate|strong="G4440"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w pearl|strong="G3135"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w street|strong="G4113"\w* of the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \add was\add* \w pure|strong="G2513"\w* \w gold|strong="G5553"\w*, as it \w were|strong="G5613"\w* \w transparent|strong="G1307"\w* \w glass|strong="G5194"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* \w therein|strong="G0846"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w Almighty|strong="G3841"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* of \w it|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w* of the \w sun|strong="G2246"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* of the \w moon|strong="G4582"\w*, \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w shine|strong="G5316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* did \w lighten|strong="G5461"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Lamb|strong="G0721"\w* \add is\add* the \w light|strong="G3088"\w* \w thereof|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w nations|strong="G1484"\w* of \w them|strong="G3588"\w* which are \w saved|strong="G4982"\w* shall \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w light|strong="G5457"\w* of \w it|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w kings|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* do \w bring|strong="G5342"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w gates|strong="G4440"\w* of \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w shall|strong="G2808"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* be \w shut|strong="G2808"\w* at \w all|strong="G3361"\w* by \w day|strong="G2250"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* there shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they shall \w bring|strong="G5342"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w* of the \w nations|strong="G1484"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w shall|strong="G1525"\w* in no \w wise|strong="G3756"\w* \w enter|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* any \w thing|strong="G3956"\w* that \w defileth|strong="G2840"\w*, \w neither|strong="G2532"\w* \add whatsoever\add* \w worketh|strong="G4160"\w* \w abomination|strong="G0946"\w*, \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \add maketh\add* a \w lie|strong="G5579"\w*: \w but|strong="G1487"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* which are \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lamb’s|strong="G0721"\w* \w book|strong="G0975"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.
